Author: tigerchik
Text: yes it will be on your medical records. I was diagnosed at 13. When I see a new doctor they generally ask if it's still a problem. I'm at a normal weight; I assume if I were really underweight they'd ask more questions.

Author: tropicgold
Text: I asked my general practitioner a hypothetical question: if I were self inducing vomit, would he have to tell my parents?  He said no.  I’m a minor.  He knows now.  I would suggest phrasing whatever you want to ask as a hypothetical situation to see their reaction.  Sorry if this doesn’t answer your question!    And where I live, hospitalisation only happens if you’re severely underweight.
